name: The 9th International Conference on Agricultural and Biological Sciences
content: The 9th International Conference on Agricultural and Biological Sciences (ABS 2023) Conference Website: http://www.absconf.org/ Organizer: Macao Convention and Exhibition Association Conference Date: July 4th-7th, 2023 Submission Deadline: April 30th, 2023 Brief Introduction: As an annual conference held successfully in Beijing, Shanghai, Qingdao, Hangzhou, Macau and online in the past 8 years, the 9th International Conference on Agricultural and Biological Sciences (ABS 2023) will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of agricultural and biological sciences. The series of plenary speech, oral and poster presentations, workshops, discussions and networking events will keep participants engaged in learning and making new connections at ABS 2023\. ABS 2023 will bring together academicians, scientists, engineers and technologists etc. from all over the world, and we hope that you will take this opportunity to join us for academic exchange. Macao is a city where east meets west. A place where traditional Chinese culture has assimilated Portuguese and Western ways to create a cultural mix. You will be surely amazed by Macao. Main Topics: Submissions of original research papers and abstracts for the main program and the doctoral consortium in all areas of ABS in Agricultural, Biological, Food and Environmental aspects includes but not limited to Agricultural and Biological Sciences Submission System: All the submissions (Abstracts or Full Papers) should be done via the online submission system: http://paper.academicconf.com/author/login.aspx?confname=ABS2023 Publication Opportunities All submitted abstracts for presentation would be included in the abstract proceeding, while the full paper will be considered for EI/Scopus Indexed Conference Proceedings or ISI indexed Journal-Agronomy etc. Conference Program July 4th -Registration July 5th -Opening Ceremony, Plenary Speech, Invited/Oral Presentation July 6th -Invited & Oral Presentation & Poster Presentations July 7th -Field Visit Confirmed Speakers Prof. Hisayoshi Hayashi, University of Tsukuba, Japan Prof. Sijun Zheng, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, China Prof. Mikihisa Umehara, Toyo University, Japan Prof. Nabil Omar, Soils, Water and Environment Res., Inst., Egypt Prof. Moniruzzaman Khondker, University of Dhaka, Bangladesh Prof. Mingjie Chen, Xinyang Normal University, China Prof. Md. Abdul Karim, University of Dhaka, Bangladesh Dr. Saddam Hussain, University of Agriculture, Pakistan … Related Conference The 6th International Conference on Applied Biochemistry and Biotechnology (ABB 2023) will be held together with ABS 2023 from July 4th-7th, 2023\. Details could be found via http://www.abbconf.org/ Contact Info: Conference Secretary: Lydia Shi Tel: 17362961533 WeChat: abs\_conf E-mail: abs@academicconf.com / abs@absconf.org Related Link： Flyer: https://opensz.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/ABS2023/file/ABS%202023%20CFP.pdf
